bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 2005.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - The street junction at the southeast corner of the Double Bath. - The activities in the Double Bath. - Observations on the row of shops opposite the North-Bath. - Researches in the Great Xenodochium and the north-west corner of the Pilgrimage Court.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.seg: GROSSMANN Peter and Jacek KOSCIUK, Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 2005.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 44 (2005) pp. 29-44, 4 plans et pll. I-VI.

[Introduction.] - The street junction at the southeast corner of the Double Bath. - The activities in the Double Bath. - Observations on the row of shops opposite the North-Bath. - Researches in the Great Xenodochium and the north-west corner of the Pilgrimage Court.
